contentList.content: Surgebinders can manipulate ten fundamental forces known as Surges, with each Surgebinder having access to two of the Surges with overlap between them, by infusing objects or beings with Stormlight.

The Windrunners are Surgebinders who use the Surges of Adhesion and Gravitation, and they are associated with the sapphire polestone. They form a Nahel bond with honorspren. Windspren form their Shardplate. The combination of Adhesion and Gravitation results in the three Lashings.

The Edgedancers are Surgebinders who use the Surges of Abrasion and Progression, and they are associated with the diamond polestone. They bond cultivationspren. They have great mobility on the battlefield and are fantastic healers.
Stormlight is expended to use Surgebinder abilities. You regain expended Stormlights after a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Regenerate HP equal to your current Surgebinder level at the start of your turn at the cost of Stormlight.
Call your spren to your side.
Summon your bonded spren. Having your spren active will give you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks
Summon your bonded spren. Having your spren active will give you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks
While your spren is active, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks

Use your reaction to reduce the damage from a ranged weapon attack by 1d10 + your Dexterity Modifier + your Surgebinder level.

If the damage is reduced to 0, you use a Stormlight Point to Deflect the Missile.
Bind an enemy still. They can't move, act or react. Attacks from within [1] are always <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Use the Abrasion surge to decrease friction around you making you impossible to restrain or slowed down.
Use the Abrasion surge to reduce wind friction to travel long distances at considerable speeds.
Your Shardblade. The weapon's damage is magical. A Shardblade is a powerful weapon capable of severing souls.
Summon your Shardblade in the form of a Warhammer.
Summon your Shardblade in the form of a Greatsword.
Summon your Shardblade in the form of a Glaive.
Summon your Shardblade in the form of a Battleaxe.
Shardplate is an ancient and magical type of full-body armor normally only found on Roshar.
Your Shardplate grants you unnatural strength and speed.
